Description: Fragment of cast figure in copper alloy; figure represented in striding pose with both arms along body; possible loop for suspension behind, but very hard to see; corroded; surface rough.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Topic of the figure too difficult to determine.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (MB.255) (phase 3)
